title: Another perma another bought acc.
body:
I mean, what's the point? It's fifth permed acc, did it reform me? No. Did it stop me from playing? No. Did it teach me how to be more toxic without getting banned? Yes.

If someone want to have good laugh, just remember I was banned for "gg open", "its over" and "can we open?", this is enough for perm after 14 days(dont get me wrong, it should be enough, toxicity is destroying this game). I find it funny, that if I used 3 and 0 in these words instead, I wouldn't be banned. I feel like Riots learning machines to detect negative behaviour are as fast as kid in special needs class, since I have been doing this for years, but always slipped up with something minor.

So the main points here, Riot should improve their shit and ppl who are crying how unfair current system is, should exploit it, so it gets improved(ok mods chill, how else are we going to get Riot to improve something without exploiting it?).

(don't be toxic if you want to win games lol, it brings nothing, if you have burner acc, w/e I guess)

Game 1
In-Game

Telling me to "chill" is a red flag for "I just did something wrong."

I'm locking this post. You're aware of the boards' rules. You're aware of the games' rules. You can either adhere to them or find yet another permaban on your account. 

Best of luck in your future endeavors.

If you have any questions about this moderation action, don't hesitate to reach out to the Boards Moderation Team via:

* The [**NA Boards Discord**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification)
* The [**Discuss the Boards**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) sub-board

Sounds like you have some sort of deeper problem. Here you are, admitting to buying accounts multiple times on a free-to-play game. Losing all your progress each and every time.

Yet you don't seem to care in the slightest that your behavior alone is placing you in this situation.

Yeah, bcs eventhough it is weird, I partly enjoy it.

Progress in LoL probably means different things to different ppl. For me, experiences(how I play) are what matter, that's something that isn't being taken away from me with bans, I never really cared about skins or whatever.

I just wanted to point out how system isn't working.

You were banned for telling someone to kill themselves (things like that that violate the zero-tolerance policy get a 14-day ban first offense), and you foolishly thought trying to be clever by substituting letters for numbers wouldn't be detected by the IFS. While the machine learning system is not perfect it's not as stupid as you seem to think it is (and neither are we for that matter), and the only one kidding themselves here is you. Also, you claim you can't control yourself but that's clearly a lie: you can, you just choose not to as it's more convenient for you to expect others to do it for you and to then complain when they don't or won't. That's not an IFS or Riot problem that's a you problem.

Yeah, w/e, keep on believing in IFS, I'm the one here who has been doing this for years and only instances where I got punished are those, where I lost myself and forgot to use symbols. System isn't working and believing in it won't improve it, stop fooling yourself.

And again, you can try it yourself as I said in other comments.

If I got banned for zero tolerence, then I'm happy that system works, but sadly, from my experiences it either doesn't or takes suspiciously long time.

the fact that you get banned before hitting level 30 with your "special technique" is enough good system that detects you before you start ruining people's ranked games
This was on euw 4fun G1 acc...

I got perma ban on my other accont I don't regret nor I give a single shit about that account since I've been permabanned alot of times.
People need to know a difference between being toxic and being tilted. There are games where we are winning I never use chat, if our botlane died 2-3 times I don't use chat I focus on gameplay.
But when those fuckers die 10 times under 10 minutes. I will tell them the worst things possible.

Why should ppl need to know difference? In both cases, it is destroying game. I mean, it is kinda hypocritic to argue against toxicity when I'm toxic myself, but it really bring nothing except more tilt, I don't remember time when lashing out helped me in long run, maybe for few moments after, but it is really pointless and I wish I could stop and I wish Riot improved their system.
